metadata.title: CVE-2018-11468 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The __mkd_trim_line function in mkdio.c in libmarkdown.a in DISCOUNT 2.2.3aallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based bufferover-read) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by mkd2html.

criterions.comment: discount: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
